# <i style="font-size: 110%; color:#990017;">Part 1. Overview</i> {- #part1}

In Part 1, the **MARSS** package and MARSS models are introduced. the format for inputs (data) and model specification are shown. Part 2 shows a series of short examples and Part 3 goes into output from **MARSS** fitted objects (class `marssMLE`) and MARSS models in general.
